message: Let's split it 50/50, it's a fair start!
I'm willing to give you 40% of the money, but I'm keeping 60% for myself. It's a better deal than 50/50, and the money will be worth less in future rounds.
I'd like a better deal, I'll make a counteroffer in Round 3
I'll take 55% now, it's a good compromise before the money loses more value
